page.title: 10BURTON SALMON LEISURE 2
page.content: After a busy week many people like to use the week-ends for relaxation. Saturday morning is a popular time to complete the household shopping at supermarkets in Selby ,Knottingley or Pontefract. Saturday afternoons and Sundays are often used for family outings.The weather often decides where the family goes to. Lotherton Hall near Leeds is a popular place for family picnics as is Bishop Wood near Selby.York provides a variety of attractions for all ages. For longer journies by car,which is the usual form of transport, Bridlington , Filey and Scarborough on the beautiful Yorkshire coast are favourite outings.
